about_the_game:
Welcome to Only in Oh!o, a chaotic and humorous FPS! Battle crazy meme bosses with wild, ridiculous weapons. Dodge, shoot, and laugh through action-packed fights against over-the-top enemies. Can you survive the madness and escape Oh!o?

                                                           Wild Boss Fights

               

"An FPS boss rush game with outrageous meme-inspired monsters, hard-as-nails gameplay, meme-worthy settings, and a roster of unique bosses, each with their own distinct                                                                   challenges, attacks, and personalities."

                                                          A Twisted Journey 

               

"While on your way to Oh!o, something goes wrong and your plane crashes. You wake up in a strange place where everything feels wrong. Every move you make brings more chaos and surprises. All you know for sure is that you must escape this strange place before it’s too late."                        

                                                        Ridiculous Weapons 

                    

"Weapons that are as ridiculous as they are deadly, combining absurd designs with devastating power, ensuring that every shot is both unpredictable and incredibly dangerous!" 

                                                              Run for It!

                 

"Good luck—now get out of Oh!o while you still can, before the chaos takes over! Time is running out, and every second brings new dangers. Escape while you still have a chance!"

"So what are you waiting for? Grab your guns, face the bosses, and escape this chaotic                                               madhouse before it’s too late!"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Intel Only)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630`
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Only In Oh!o

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Your goal is simple: defeat the wild bosses of Oh!o and escape before it's too late! This funny, fast-paced FPS combines chaos, humor, and relentless action as you battle through outrageous meme-inspired monsters. Can you defeat the bosses, escape the madness, and survive Oh!o?
